# clean data

```{r}
# using dplyr
data_sun_work <- data_sun_raw %>%
  mutate(Date=dmy(Date)) %>% # make it as a date format (not a factor)
   mutate(Plot=factor(Date)) %>%# make it a factor (i.e. not number)
   mutate(SunScan = ifelse(SunScan<0,0,SunScan))

str(data_sun_work)
```
